name: The Givers: Dedicated to all postal workers this holiday season
name_original: The Givers: Dedicated to all postal workers this holiday season
description:
Date: Dec. 23

Objective: Everybody needs a solid Christmas....so who do they call?....well, actually, they order from Amazon because they have a great thing called Amazon Prime where you can pretty much get any prime package delivered to your house in 2 days....it's fantastic. Anyways....

                                                                                                                                       

CONTROLS

Move with WASD

Pick up and throw boxes with LEFT-CLICK

Enter truck when inside drivers seat with 'E'

Open/Close map with SHIFT

Check delivery list with SPACE

                                                                                                                                       

Made in 2 days for the Yogscast Game Jam Programmer : Max Porter

Cutie/Art/Story : Mikale "Slightly larger than average dog" Mikelson
